targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "sensor_index"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = 'CPU' AND
  sensor_type = 'Load' AND
  sensor = 'CPU Total'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "sensor_index"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = 'RAM' AND
  sensor_type = 'Load'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "sensor_index"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = 'GpuNvidia' AND
  sensor_type = 'Load'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "sensor_index"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = 'GpuAti' AND
  sensor_type = 'Load'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "sensor_index"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = 'HDD' AND

GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value) AS "sensor_index"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = 'CPU' AND
  sensor_type = 'Load' AND
  sensor != 'CPU Total'
GROUP BY 1, sensor,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),

WHERE

ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value)
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware = $network AND
  hardware_type = 'NIC' AND
  sensor = 'Download Speed'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value)
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND

  hardware = $network AND
  hardware_type = 'NIC' AND

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value)
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE

  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = $fan AND
  sensor_type = 'Fan'

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("time",$__interval),
  sensor AS metric,
  avg(value)
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = $control AND
  sensor_type = 'Control'
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "time" AS "time",
  sensor AS metric,
  value * 1000000 AS "value * 1000000"
FROM ohm_stats
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("time") AND
  host = '$instance' AND
  hardware_type = $hertz AND
  sensor_type = 'Clock'
ORDER BY 1,2

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT(hardware_type) FROM ohm_stats WHERE $__timeFilter(time) AND sensor_type = 'Power'
